member.name: F:Net.Bertware.Get.api.UA
member.summary: User agent: Bertware x.y/application_name application_version [DEBUG]/hash/mail Hash is set to 0 for debug, and is used to detect fake distributions (evt. banning them from the server)

member.name: M:Net.Bertware.Get.api.CheckVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check which from 2 versions is newer. returns -1 if old version is newer, 0 if equal, 1 if new version is newer
member.param: the old version, x.x, x.x.x or x.x.x.x format
the new version, x.x, x.x.x or x.x.x.x format
member.returns: -1 if old version is newer, 0 if equal, 1 if new version is newer
member.remarks: This function can handle version numbers with parts up to 65535

member.name: P:Net.Bertware.Get.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Net.Bertware.Get.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Net.Bertware.Get.My.Resources.Resources.Updater
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Byte[].

member.name: T:Net.Bertware.Get.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
